# External exercises index

This file points to the main topic README files inside the `devops-exercises` submodule so you can quickly jump from the revision hub to exercises and solutions.

Note: the content below lives in the submodule at `../../devops-exercises/` (license: third-party). For interview-focused concise notes, see the local `devops-revision/` topic READMEs.

## How to use

1. Read the local interview-ready READMEs in `devops-revision/` for concise theory and cheat-sheets.
2. Follow a link above to open exercises from the `devops-exercises` submodule when you want hands-on practice or example solutions.
